sentences.sContent: Check if all the configurations listed above have been performed.

sentences.sCn: 检查是否执行了上面列出的所有配置。

sentences.sContent: Select any one of the listed files to open and edit it in the respective editor.

sentences.sCn: 选择任意一个列出的文件，以在各自的编辑器中打开并编辑它。

sentences.sContent: The relationships I have and that I consider to be meaningful have all of the qualities listed above.
sentences.sContent_eng: The relationships I have and that I consider to be meaningful have all of the qualities listed above.
sentences.sCn: 我拥有的人脉，其中我认为有意义的关系包含上述列出的所有品质。
